price: 73. Y, ciertamente, tu Señor concede Su favor a los hombres, pero la mayoría de ellos no son agradecidos.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka ladhū faḍlin ʿalā al-nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūna
